item.title: About
item.description: Hello, let’s get acquainted! My name is Kirill, but in the sphere of the Internet, I’m known as Zhora. You might ask why? Simply put, all my acquaintances are used to calling me this way. My journey in the field of cybersecurity began in 2022 when I started to learn about penetration testing and enrolled in the best course for Russian speakers, WAPT - Web Application Pentester. There, I learned about such web vulnerabilities in applications as XSS and SQL Injection.
